message.content: {"id": "112458", "title": "Bug 112458 - Property Editor does not update when switching to Master Page viewer", "description": "When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor still displays the properties of layout items. The expected behavior is for the Property Editor to update and reflect the properties of the Master Page. However, the actual behavior is that it continues to show the properties of the layout items.", "OB": "The Property Editor should update and display the properties of the Master Page when switching to the Master Page viewer.", "EB": "The Property Editor does not update and continues to show the properties of the layout items when switching to the Master Page viewer.", "SR": "1. Switch to the Master Page viewer.\n2. Verify that the Property Editor does not update and still shows the properties of the layout items."}
